block.p: The five most e-mailed articles from nytimes.com/sports for April 6 to 13.
1. THROWING BATTERS CURVES BEFORE THROWING A PITCH Creighton pitcher Pat Venditte is ambidextrous.
(Published April 6)
2. A CUSTOM RIDE, LEGAL FOR THE STREET OR THE 18TH TEE A community where golf carts serve as transportation.
(April 9)
3. BIDDERS ARE LINING UP FOR A CHANCE TO OWN THE CUBS Despite a dismal record, a team and its ballpark are hot property.
(April 11)
4. A FIRST-CLASS RESPONSE TO A SECOND-CLASS PUT-DOWN Sports of The Times: The Rutgers women's basketball team takes the high road in the wake of Don Imus's comments.
(April 11)
5. RUTGERS WOMEN SEND IMUS AN ANGRY MESSAGE News article.
(April 11)
